issue.title: [C++] Disable relevant compute kernels if ARROW_WITH_UTF8PROC=OFF
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9220](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9220). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
utf8proc should not be a hard dependency of ARROW_COMPUTE

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9220?focusedCommentId=17147128) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
`[~apitrou]` could you take this one from me?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9220?focusedCommentId=17148733) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
